title: FAAOTU 089LG 3-sided * 360-degree vertical straight line laser horizontal 12V lithium battery outdoor green level tool
name: MAKITA FAAOTU 089LG 3-Sided Vertical Straight Line Laser Level Green Beam
description_short:
Introducing the FAAOTU 089LG, your new go-to for precise and reliable leveling in any environment. This powerful 3-sided laser boasts a bright green beam visibility that cuts through dust and sunlight, ensuring clear lines even outdoors.

But that's not all! The FAAOTU 089LG offers:

  • 360-degree vertical leveling for effortless wall framing and ceiling work.
  • A straight line laser projection for precise marking of edges and corners.
  • A rugged, compact design powered by a long-lasting 12V lithium battery, ready to tackle any job.

Experience the difference precision makes with the FAAOTU 089LG. Level up your projects with ease and confidence.
description:
FAAOTU 089LG Laser Level

The FAAOTU 089LG is a powerful and versatile laser level designed for professionals and DIY enthusiasts alike. This robust tool offers exceptional accuracy and range, making it ideal for various leveling applications both indoors and outdoors.

Features

  • 3-sided Laser Projection: Provides precise horizontal and vertical lines across three axes.
  • 360-Degree Vertical Line: Continuously projects a perfectly straight vertical line for accurate column alignment and wall hanging.
  • Green Laser Technology: Offers superior visibility in daylight conditions compared to traditional red lasers.
  • Self-Leveling Function: Automatically self-levels within 4 range, ensuring accuracy even on uneven surfaces.
  • Durable Construction: Features a robust housing designed to withstand demanding jobsite environments.
  • 12V Lithium Battery: Provides extended runtime and reliable power for prolonged use.

Specifications

  • Laser Class: Class II
  • Wave Length: 532nm
  • Line Visibility Range: Up to 60 meters in daylight conditions
  • Self-Leveling Range: 4
  • Working Temperature: -10C to +50C
  • Battery Type: 12V Lithium
  • Dimensions: 18cm x 10cm x 6cm
  • Weight: 0.7kg

Benefits

The FAAOTU 089LG laser level delivers numerous advantages for users:

  • Enhanced Accuracy: Precise horizontal and vertical lines ensure accurate leveling for various tasks.
  • Increased Efficiency: Speed up your workflow with faster and more reliable leveling compared to traditional methods.
  • Improved Visibility: The green laser technology offers superior visibility, even in bright sunlight.
  • Ease of Use: The self-leveling function and intuitive design simplify operation for users of all skill levels.

Usage

The FAAOTU 089LG is versatile and can be used for a wide range of applications:

  • Hanging pictures and artwork accurately.
  • Leveling shelves, cabinets, and furniture.
  • Installing tile and flooring with precise alignment.
  • Projecting lines for drywall installation and construction.
  • Aligning columns, beams, and other structural elements.

description:

The Makita DAS180 Air Dust Removal Gun is a powerful tool designed to effectively clear dust and debris from hard-to-reach areas. Powered by an 18V lithium-ion battery, this cordless gun delivers high airflow for efficient cleaning without the hassle of cords.

Features

  • Powerful Motor: Equipped with a high-torque motor that produces strong airflow to effectively remove dust and debris from tight spaces.
  • Adjustable Nozzle: Features an adjustable nozzle for customized airflow direction and intensity, ensuring precise cleaning in various situations.
  • Cordless Design: Runs on an 18V lithium-ion battery for cordless operation, providing freedom of movement and convenience.
  • Lightweight and Compact: Ergonomically designed with a lightweight and compact form factor for easy handling and maneuverability.

Specifications

  • Voltage: 18V
  • Airflow: Up to 30 CFM (Cubic Feet Per Minute)
  • Nozzle Diameter: Adjustable
  • Battery Type: Lithium-ion
  • Weight: Approximately 4 lbs.

Benefits

The Makita DAS180 Air Dust Removal Gun offers numerous benefits for professionals and DIY enthusiasts:

  • Efficient Dust Removal: The high airflow effectively clears dust and debris from tight spaces, such as corners, crevices, and hard-to-reach areas.
  • Improved Worksite Visibility: By keeping work areas clean and free of dust, the gun enhances visibility and allows for a safer and more efficient working environment.
  • Versatility: The adjustable nozzle provides flexibility in directing airflow for various cleaning tasks.
  • Cordless Convenience: The cordless design eliminates the need for power cords, providing greater freedom of movement and accessibility.

Usage

The Makita DAS180 Air Dust Removal Gun is ideal for a wide range of applications:

  • Construction Sites:** Clearing dust from work areas and around tools.
  • Home Improvement Projects: Removing sawdust, debris, and drywall dust during renovations.
  • Automotive Repair: Blowing out compressed air from engine compartments and tight spaces.
  • Industrial Settings: Cleaning machinery, equipment, and workbenches.

Always wear appropriate safety gear, such as eye protection and a dust mask, when operating the tool.

The DDF487 delivers an impressive 10mm chuck capacity to handle a wide range of drill bits and screwdrivers. Its variable speed trigger gives you precise control over your projects, from delicate tasks to heavy-duty drilling.

  • Lightweight & Ergonomic Design: Ensures comfortable and fatigue-free operation for extended use.

The Makita DDF487 is a versatile tool that seamlessly transitions from drilling to driving, making it an essential addition to any toolbox. Its compact size and intuitive controls make it ideal for both professionals and DIY enthusiasts.

Features

  • Variable Speed Trigger: Allows you to control the drilling speed precisely for different materials and tasks.

  • Chuck Size: 10mm
  • No Load Speed: 0-2,000 RPM

For optimal performance, always use the appropriate drill bits and screwdriver attachments for the material being worked on. Refer to the user manual for detailed instructions and safety precautions.

  • Paddle Switch: Provides easy operation and reduces fatigue during extended use.
  • Spindle Lock Button: Simplifies disc changes for quick and efficient tool maintenance.
  • Dust Ejection System: Helps keep the work area clean by directing dust away from the user.

Battery Capacity: 6.0Ah

Disc Size: 125mm
